article.title: Galaxy And Mass Assembly: Automatic Morphological Classification of Galaxies Using Statistical Learning

multiple_choice_question.text: What type of galaxies are shown in Figure 2?
What is the primary classification method used to determine the labels in the top right corner of each postage stamp in Figure 3?
Which morphological galaxy type generally returns the lowest average success ratio according to Figure 11?
What does the prime diagonal in Figure 13 represent?
choices: Objects where the visual classification and all four algorithms disagree.
Objects where the visual classification and all four algorithms agree.
Objects misclassified by all four algorithms as type LBS.
Objects misclassified by all four algorithms as type E.

multiple_choice_question.text: What does the function f(x) in Formula (A1) represent?
